website_summaries.verdict: A great foldable pair of earmuffs that you can tuck in a coat pocket.
pros: A behind-the-head design that fits snugly and can easily fit under a hat
cons: Some people found these earmuffs too small for bigger heads

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these earmuffs for my husband fior work usingbamazin prime 2 day delivery & didnt receive them until 5 days later. The were way too small & didn’t fit around the back of mine or my husbands head & if you turn your head at all they fall off. They seemed to be more of a child’s size earmuff. They are not adjustable or comfortable & I wouldn’t recommend them to anyone else. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits a big head nicely
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about fit because I have a big head, but it fits great. Definitely a quality product for the price. Keeps my ears warm even in windy, zero degree weather.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought these for the husband and he loved them for our adventure in maine
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the husband and he loved them for our adventure in maine. Kept his ears warm and cozy.
customer_reviews.author: Zulema Solis

customer_reviews.title: Ear muffs that work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Very warm. Seem durable. Comfortable in the ears. Works well with earbuds
customer_reviews.author: Phart1236

customer_reviews.title: Fluffy warm and bendable
customer_reviews.text: They are bulkier than expected. This is perhaps my 3rd or 4th pair of behind the head earmuffs. I had a different brand each time. These are among the top but are not the best that I had due to their fluffiness but they do the job and fold as described.
customer_reviews.author: BKLYNRoc

customer_reviews.title: He says they fit great with a wooly cap on
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my dad. He says they fit great with a wooly cap on, they're comfortable, and easy to open and put on with arthritic hands. Best of all, they keep his ears very warm when he's outside in blustery winter weather doing hours of yardwork. 4 stars because I don't know how well they will hold up after a lot of use.
customer_reviews.author: Isabella B

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but slides everytime from head after some time
customer_reviews.text: It’s build Quality is good., good for ladies with big head., it is big for most of the ladies head., I am male with 5ft 10 inches height. When i wear this it start slide from your ears after sometime and it makes me little uncomfortable. It is just ok product as comfort, firm attachment to head concerned.
customer_reviews.author: saichand

customer_reviews.title: Slightly too big... Expands by clicks, but can't get the right fit.
customer_reviews.text: They're too large and don't stay put. It's like they're in cheap knock off version of the real thing that I've seen other places. I wish I hadn't bought them. What a pain! Imagine they would stay if you wore them on the top of your head... Which no one does anymore. I will probably end up donating them and getting Quality ones!
customer_reviews.author: M.R.

customer_reviews.title: Too bulky for me
customer_reviews.text: A little too big & thick. Foldable design is not the best. My old ones folded to reduce the size by 50%. These because they are soo big thick are barely reduced down to 75% makibg them bulky to carry. They do keep the ears warm.
customer_reviews.author: brijeshsshah

customer_reviews.title: Barely Fit & Wires Felt on Ears
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big guy but not huge (6'1" 225 lb) and wear average size hats. Wrapping around the back of my head, near the base of my skull, these will not expand enough to fully cover my ears. They cover most but not all since they will not expand enough. I can also feel the metal band/frame within each ear covering making them uncomfortable after and extended period of time (10 minutes). I would not purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sooo warm!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, these earmuffs are just what I need for this winter. It fits comfortably and it's the warmest one i've ever owned. The fur on the inside gives extra warmth that others just don't provide. Huge fan of them!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan B

customer_reviews.title: Very Functional
customer_reviews.text: They are bigger than I expected so they take up a bit of space when folded, but they do the job of keeping your ears warm well. Plus your hair still looks good once you come in from the cold.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Tarvin

customer_reviews.title: ... Eve (after having them one day) and they were good enough to buy again
customer_reviews.text: Lost my first pair on New Years Eve (after having them one day) and they were good enough to buy again. Don't fit real tight but stay on for casual use which is all I need them for.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: falling off
customer_reviews.text: Feels as though the earmuff is falling off. Does not "hug" the neck. Loose fitting. I will return the product.
customer_reviews.author: luckyduck

customer_reviews.title: Bigger muffs than most
customer_reviews.text: It fit snug but not too tight. I like the larger muffs cause I have large ears and the material on the inside is very soft and does not itch
customer_reviews.author: reyne roman

customer_reviews.title: really nice earmuff
customer_reviews.text: These are really soft and warm. However, I have a large size head and they are a little tight on my head. I will probably give them away to someone who is a better fit.
customer_reviews.author: bus driver

customer_reviews.title: I had several different types of these over the years ...
customer_reviews.text: I had several different types of these over the years. This one is warm, but the flexibility and adjustability lacks behind other (slightly more expensive models).
customer_reviews.author: DRM

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy having toasty warm ears on my morning walk. Very warm and comfortable. They do not shift when I am walking, so no need to move them. Would certainly reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Senior Sue

customer_reviews.title: A quality piece but not for its packing!
customer_reviews.text: The item was shipped and delivered on time. Though the item itself looks great and superior in quality, the packing was not that great! They could have used a nice packing similar to that of 800s so it can be reused for its storage purpose. The item has flexibility to be folded and worn in a wrist when not in use and that is another good feature I always look for from these ear muffs.
customer_reviews.author: Myfin Milan

customer_reviews.title: nice warm very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Now this is a true story this product save my life, back in February a slip and fall on the ice this product thickness and cushion save my head from cracking it on the concrete on my driveway there are nice and warm and I will definitely buy another set
customer_reviews.author: Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Warm and soft on the inside
customer_reviews.text: Nice and expandable...warm enough for Cali winter and walking by the water...About to take them to Oregon Coast and will really put them to the test...
customer_reviews.author: Helen Vardakis

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend anyone looking for an ear muffs.
customer_reviews.text: It's an awesome piece, I actually ordered it second time. I got the first one beginning last winter and liked it very much, it keeps very warm and covers whole ears, very good quality. I lost it during my last visit to Willis Towers do ordered another next day. I feel the newer piece is slightly lighter but still very good.
customer_reviews.author: Vipin

customer_reviews.title: They tend to slide off your ear..
customer_reviews.text: Like many they never quite fit right it seems to me it would really be simple to make it so it won’t slide of your ear
customer_reviews.author: Gleeford Weston Honn

customer_reviews.title: but the warmth they provide is great.
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastically warm. I only wish they folded up a little more compact, but the warmth they provide is great.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby D

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, covers my ears well.
customer_reviews.text: This covers my ears well. A little smaller than the one I had before. This one is well made and folds nicely so I can keep this in my jacket pocket.
customer_reviews.author: A.M.

customer_reviews.title: Bit too small
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit too small and it's a bit uncomfortable but other than that the fabric and such is cozy and nice but still a bit hard to wear. I'll give it 3 star because I still like it and it came in fast! -2 stars because it's small and hard to get on and off without hurting the sensitive spot on your ears
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Duc duong

customer_reviews.title: Warm and Soft!
customer_reviews.text: So great to purchase earmuffs that aren’t too big & don’t slide down. Can have them on & still put a hoodie & without them sticking out. Easy to roll together and put away. Love these!
customer_reviews.author: M. P. Wing

customer_reviews.title: Seem to work alright but are a little cheap
customer_reviews.text: These seem to work alright, but get uncomfortable if i wear them longer then about an hour. They also feel like they want to fall off my ears pretty bad.
customer_reviews.author: D R

customer_reviews.title: Warm and cozy
customer_reviews.text: This earmuff is standard and does what it is made for: keep my ears warm. The tightness is perfect and keeps in place. The fur keeps my ears very warm. It fits me perfectly. I am a female so, I’d say this would fit most ladies.
customer_reviews.author: Eliza Shu

customer_reviews.title: Nice and warm
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my boyfriend and he is a big fan. He likes the soft inside and especially likes the way they have a little expansion.
customer_reviews.author: SingerSamantha

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say except that the product does the job as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Gruru

customer_reviews.title: Good basic earmuffs
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Warm Fold up for portability Soft Cons: A little small for my head
customer_reviews.author: Miss MandaAnne

customer_reviews.title: These are great
customer_reviews.text: I really like these because my ears are the only part of me that seem to get cold. Plus, I like that they fold unlike other ear warmers.
customer_reviews.author: Thinker

customer_reviews.title: Lux muffs
customer_reviews.text: Love these muffs. Bought a second pair as a gift. They extend and contract easily and are super warm and comfy on 30 degree days. Fits comfortably over ears and stays in place.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Eat Muffs
customer_reviews.text: These ear muffs do a great job of keeping my ears warm out I. The cold winter wind.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent protection for the ears
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and amazing ear muffs that offer a good protection for the ears during the winter season.

customer_reviews.title: very tight
customer_reviews.text: Ptoduct quality is good for money, easily folded but very tight and can get ear pain within 1 hr.

customer_reviews.title: Nice eat muffs.
customer_reviews.text: Good ear muff. Size and fit are good. Keeps my ears warm.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 7. Lol Enough said. Gifts, stocking stuffer... Great and keep your ears warm.

customer_reviews.title: A little snug.
customer_reviews.text: I admittedly have a large-ish head, but it'd be nice if these were a tad bit larger. They're not really tight so if they get bumped even a little, they're off my ears.
customer_reviews.author: R. G.

customer_reviews.title: Really heats up
customer_reviews.text: Really worm. Is very comfortable to wear and it gets really hot when your wear it for a long period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Warm earmuffs for everyone
customer_reviews.text: These earmuffs are so soft and comfy. They come in a sealed ziplock package. They are black cotton on the outside and a fuzzy material inside, so your ears are stay super warm. The muffs are also adjustable. The only bad thing is that they sometimes come off your head because they go on the back of the head.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Hart

customer_reviews.title: Super soft!
customer_reviews.text: These are comfy, soft and warm. Worth the money. They fit me perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Great ear muffs
customer_reviews.text: The Classic Fleece Ear Muffs are as described, arrived within 2 days, are reasonably priced and seem to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and adjusted well to fit
customer_reviews.text: Super soft and adjusted well to fit. Looked of good quality and packaged well also. Earmuffs were not to tight or too loose.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Quality and comfort is great. It works great during peak snow times too
customer_reviews.text: Quality and comfort is great. It works great during peak snow times too. After wearing, I felt a bit bigger in size and then got used to it.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a gift. They have been used all winter. Thank you vendor!!

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Pretty uncomfortable; press tightly in front of ears and I have a small head. OK for short periods of time.

customer_reviews.title: If you don’t have a larger head they will be fine
customer_reviews.text: They are warm, soft and thicker than I thought. My issue is they are a little to small. I opened them up all the way and they barely cover my ears. I wear a large hat. If you don’t have a larger head they will be fine
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: ... them again if I misplaced them - that's a pretty good endorsement
customer_reviews.text: I'd purchase them again if I misplaced them - that's a pretty good endorsement, I feel.

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my fiance. He loves them. He really likes the soft fur on the insides and that the headband portion is adjustable. They do not squeeze his head at all.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a great purchase that we will keep for years to come
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected. Kept ears warm in windy snow weather. Definitely a great purchase that we will keep for years to come.

customer_reviews.title: Good choice

customer_reviews.title: And warm. I like that they don’t mess up the top of my hair. I was expecting a little fuller cut that wrapped the ear a little b

customer_reviews.title: it pulls apart but not far enough it would be a great product for the younger crowd but not for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Eather the product is too small or I have a big head, it pulls apart but not far enough it would be a great product for the younger crowd but not for the adult store and should not be advertised as such.

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my ears warm. Wouldnt call it overly great or anything but you get what you pay for.

customer_reviews.title: Best for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Soft, firm, and warm! These will definitely keep your ears super cozy outside. There is a firm wire in them that will keep them against your head. I wish the wire was a little softer, since I can feel it sometimes. Other than that, really happy with the product!

customer_reviews.title: Just like picture!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect  fit

customer_reviews.title: Fast Service, Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: The collapsible earmuffs are great! They were a decent price, warm, unobtrusive, smart looking and easy to carry! They came quickly in two days. What more could you want?

customer_reviews.title: Great in winter

product_meta.title: Komene Classic Fleece Ear Muffs Collapsible Behind-The-Head Ear Warmers for Women and Men
product_meta.description: ◆TAKE GOOD CARE OF YOUR EARS. The ear is one of the most Important BUT often forgotten body parts exposed to cold temperatures and biting wind. They need high quality of muffs to keep them warm and toasty at all times. Mocofo earmuffs will keep your ears comfortable and warm instead of numb frozen. Rescue your ears from the frozen and snow-covered land! ◆PREVENTION OF COLD WIND AND BLOWING SNOW OUTSIDE. Don't you want the feel of fur against your ears and have the luxurious material warming up your ears? Mocofo adjustable earmuffs provides ears a touch of sheer luxury along. ◆WHY CHOOSE Mocofo INSTEAD OF CHEAPER ONE? Mocofo stylish, warm, adjustable and foldable earmuffs are perfect for the cold winters, which makes it convenient to carry, storage and goes great with your hats, glasses and helmets. Mocofo makes your life better. ◆SPECIFICATIONS: Material: 100% Pashmina-like Soft Acrylic Dimensions: 5.5 inch x 4.5 inch. Size: Mocofo earmuffs are adjustable from 13.7 inches to 16.5 inches to make sure that they fit comfortably and stay on securely.
feature_bullets: · ✌AFRAID OF BEING UNABLE TO PLAY PLEASINGLY IN WINTER DUE TO COLD WIND AND BLOWING SNOW? Mocofo earmuffs prevent them with exquisite craft-reliable quality. Delicate stitching provides long lasting use, and it perfectly protects your ears against chilliness in winter outside. Warm your ears up when cycling, running, skiing, snowboarding and ice skating, etc. Care for your ears Please.

· ✌ADJUSTABLE FOR FITTING MOST OF SIZES AND FOLDABLE FOR BEING EASY TO CARRY AND STORAGE: It can be stretched from 13 inches up to 16.7 inches and fit in the normal jacket/coat size pocket when you fold it to the original shape.

· ✌BEHIND-THE-HEAD DESIGN FITS COMFORTABLLY AND GO GREAT WITH YOUR HATS, GLASSES AND HELMETS: The band wraps around the back of your head and fits comfortably but doesn't mess you hair up. They go great with hats, glasses, helmets and earphone and make keeping your ears warm since the plush earmuffs that wrap around the back of your head.

· ✌CHOOSE THE THOUGHTFUL GIFT AND ENJOR PLAYFUL WINTER WITH YOUR FRIENDS: The earmuffs of Mocofo is one of the best choices for yourself or a gift for your family and friends. They cover your entire ears and look fashionable on both men and women.

· ✌LIFETIME WARRANTY: We Guarantee our customers 100% satisfaction with our high quality of earmuffs. If there are any problems, just email us and get a New Replacement or a Full Refund WITH NO Excuse!
